name: jww-parser
description: JWW file parser with JSON output powered by MoonBit
author: f12o

scripts.build:types: mkdir -p dist && cp types/index.d.ts dist/index.d.ts && cp target/js/release/build/moonbit.d.ts dist/moonbit.d.ts
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build:moon && pnpm run build:patch && pnpm run build:bundle && pnpm run build:types && pnpm run build:docs
scripts.set-version: node scripts/sync-version.js && git add package.json moon.mod.json examples/package.json
